edu.biu.scapi.circuits.circuit
Class BooleanCircuit

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.circuits.circuit.BooleanCircuit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BooleanCircuit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A software representation of a boolean circuit. The circuit is constructed from Wires and Gates. Once input has been set, the compute() function performs the computation and returns the computed output Wires. The verify function verifies that two gates are equivalent.

Author:
Steven Goldfeder
See Also:
Serialized Form
